title: Deep Cuts (Emotional & Real)
description: Vulnerable, nostalgic, and bonding. Perfect for best friends at 2 AM, sleepovers, and camping trips.

cards.content: Truth: What is a friendship you lost that you still wish you had?
cards.back: Dare: Send a text to someone you miss but haven't spoken to in a year. Just say 'Thinking of you.'

cards.content: Truth: When was the last time you cried, and why?
cards.back: Dare: Scroll to the first photo in your camera roll and tell the story behind it.

cards.content: Truth: What is your biggest regret in life so far?
cards.back: Dare: Call a parent or sibling and tell them you love them (without explaining why).

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room makes you feel the most safe?
cards.back: Dare: Hug the person to your right for 20 seconds. No talking, just holding.

cards.content: Truth: What is one thing you hate about yourself that you wish you could change?
cards.back: Dare: Look in a mirror (or selfie camera) and give yourself three genuine compliments out loud.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever been in love with someone who didn't love you back?
cards.back: Dare: Show the group the last photo you deleted from your phone.

cards.content: Truth: What is the hardest goodbye you have ever had to say?
cards.back: Dare: Write a short note to your younger self on your phone and read it to the group.

cards.content: Truth: If you died tomorrow, what would be your biggest unfinished business?
cards.back: Dare: Let someone read the last 3 notes in your Notes app.

cards.content: Truth: What is a lie you told that hurt someone you care about?
cards.back: Dare: Admit a flaw you have that you are trying to work on.

cards.content: Truth: Who is the one person you want to make proud the most?
cards.back: Dare: Post a photo of you and a friend on your Story with a caption about why you appreciate them.

cards.content: Truth: What is your happiest memory from childhood?
cards.back: Dare: Share a song that makes you cry.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever felt like a failure?
cards.back: Dare: Let the group ask you three rapid-fire questions you must answer honestly.

cards.content: Truth: What is the scariest nightmare you've ever had?
cards.back: Dare: Turn off the lights and sit in silence with the group for one minute.

cards.content: Truth: What is one thing you have never told your parents?
cards.back: Dare: Send a voice note to your best friend (not in the room) telling them why they matter to you.

cards.content: Truth: If you could apologize to one person from your past, who would it be?
cards.back: Dare: Draft an apology text to someone (you don't have to send it, but you must read it).

cards.content: Truth: What is the most pain (physical or emotional) you have ever been in?
cards.back: Dare: Let someone in the group hold your hand for the next round.

cards.content: Truth: Do you think you are a good person?
cards.back: Dare: Tell each person in the room one quality you admire about them.

cards.content: Truth: What is a secret you are terrified of coming out?
cards.back: Dare: Unlock your phone and place it in the center of the circle for 2 minutes.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever sabotaged a relationship because you were scared?
cards.back: Dare: Make intense eye contact with the person across from you for 60 seconds without laughing.

cards.content: Truth: What is the loneliest you have ever felt?
cards.back: Dare: Ask for a hug from the person you feel most distant from in the room.

cards.content: Truth: If you could relive one day of your life, which one would it be?
cards.back: Dare: Show a photo of yourself from an 'awkward phase' and explain how you felt back then.

cards.content: Truth: What is something you are struggling with right now that no one knows about?
cards.back: Dare: Let the person to your left ask you ANY question, and you must answer it.

cards.content: Truth: Who was your first true heartbreak?
cards.back: Dare: Describe your first heartbreak in three words.

cards.content: Truth: Do you believe in soulmates?
cards.back: Dare: Tell the group about a time you felt truly loved.

cards.content: Truth: What is a habit you have that you are ashamed of?
cards.back: Dare: Let the group look through your YouTube or TikTok watch history.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever broken someone's heart?
cards.back: Dare: Call a grandparent or older relative just to say hello.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most expensive mistake you've ever made?
cards.back: Dare: Show your bank account balance to the person on your right.

cards.content: Truth: If you could change one decision from your past, what would it be?
cards.back: Dare: Tell a story about a time you failed miserably.

cards.content: Truth: What are you most afraid of losing?
cards.back: Dare: Give your phone to the group and let them read the last text you sent to your mom/dad.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever blamed your parents for something that went wrong in your life?
cards.back: Dare: Say one thing you forgive your parents for out loud.

cards.content: Truth: What is the meanest thing anyone has ever said to you?
cards.back: Dare: Say three nice things about the person you like least in your life (don't name them).

cards.content: Truth: When did you last feel truly proud of yourself?
cards.back: Dare: Stand up and make a toast to yourself.

cards.content: Truth: Do you think you are easy or hard to love?
cards.back: Dare: Ask the group: 'What is my worst trait?' and listen without defending yourself.

cards.content: Truth: What is a dream you have given up on?
cards.back: Dare: Speak for one minute about what you want your life to look like in 5 years.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever hurt someone physically?
cards.back: Dare: Let someone draw a heart on your wrist with a pen.

cards.content: Truth: Who do you wish was in this room right now?
cards.back: Dare: Close your eyes and describe your 'Happy Place' in detail.

cards.content: Truth: What is the biggest misunderstanding people have about you?
cards.back: Dare: Post a status update saying 'I appreciate my friends' without any context.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever lost a pet that meant the world to you?
cards.back: Dare: Show a picture of your childhood home or pet.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most selfish thing you have ever done?
cards.back: Dare: Offer to do a favor for everyone in the room (get water, clean up trash) right now.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever ghosted a friend?
cards.back: Dare: Text a friend you haven't seen in a while and ask to hang out.

cards.content: Truth: What makes you cry instantly?
cards.back: Dare: Watch a sad video clip chosen by the group without looking away.

cards.content: Truth: If you could know the date of your death, would you want to?
cards.back: Dare: Lie on the floor and close your eyes for 2 minutes while the group talks around you.

cards.content: Truth: What is a grudge you are still holding onto?
cards.back: Dare: Say out loud: 'I forgive [Name]' (even if you don't fully mean it yet, try).

cards.content: Truth: Who was your favorite teacher and why?
cards.back: Dare: Email or message an old teacher/mentor thanking them.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever felt invisible?
cards.back: Dare: Stand in the center of the room and let everyone give you a high-five.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most embarrassing thing you believed as a child?
cards.back: Dare: Sing a lullaby you remember from childhood.

cards.content: Truth: What part of your body are you most insecure about?
cards.back: Dare: Point to that body part and say 'Thank you for serving me.'

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever cheated on a test or plagiarized?
cards.back: Dare: Confess a small secret you've been keeping from the group.

cards.content: Truth: What is the best advice you ever received but didn't take?
cards.back: Dare: Give the person on your left a piece of genuine life advice.

cards.content: Truth: Do you think you have turned out like your parents?
cards.back: Dare: Imitate your mom or dad's most annoying habit.

cards.content: Truth: What is a song that reminds you of a breakup?
cards.back: Dare: Play that song and explain why it hurts.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever questioned your religion or beliefs?
cards.back: Dare: Share one thing you believe in strongly (aliens, ghosts, karma, god).

cards.content: Truth: What is the nicest thing a stranger has ever done for you?
cards.back: Dare: Close your eyes and trust the person to your right to guide you around the room.

cards.content: Truth: When was the last time you felt truly happy?
cards.back: Dare: Show the group the photo you use as your lock screen and explain it.

cards.content: Truth: What is something you want to achieve before you die?
cards.back: Dare: Create a bucket list item and commit to doing it this year.

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever kept a secret that was eating you alive?
cards.back: Dare: Whisper a worry you have to the person on your left.

cards.content: Truth: Who in this room do you admire the most and why?
cards.back: Dare: Look that person in the eye and tell them why you admire them.

cards.content: Truth: What is one thing you wish you could tell your ex?
cards.back: Dare: Record a voice memo saying what you wish you could say (then delete it).

cards.content: Truth: Have you ever laughed at a funeral (or inappropriate time)?
cards.back: Dare: Tell a story about a time you laughed when you shouldn't have.

cards.content: Truth: What is the most meaningful gift you have ever received?
cards.back: Dare: Find an object in the room and 'gift' it to someone with a heartfelt speech.
